thread.title: The next Game of Thrones? Netflix announces 'Castlevania' TV series - and the internet is VERY excited
thread.title_full: The next Game of Thrones? Netflix announces 'Castlevania' TV series - and the internet is VERY excited

author: Jeff Parsons
title: The next Game of Thrones? Netflix announces 'Castlevania' TV series - and the internet is VERY excited
text:
Lead producer Adi Shankar shared the news on Facebook and was met with quite a reaction. 
"This is the stuff of dreams," wrote one. 
"Adi + Netflix + Castlevania it's too f g good to be true!" offered another. 
The series is set to be animated, but no voice cast has yet been confirmed. Shankar however has promised that it will be dark, satirical and flip the vampire sub-genre on its head. Read More Will Castlevania be as popular as Game of Thrones? 
He has even compared it to the ultimate fantasy TV series of modern times - Game of Thrones. 
"This is very much Castlevania done in the vein of Game of Thrones," he told IGN . 
Big claims indeed, but Netflix has a history of producing decent, gritty new shows. 
Sadly, there's no precise release date. All we know is that we'll be getting season one this year and season two in 2018. poll loading Are you a fan of Castlevania? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
